Tutorial

Open the menu

After the plugin has been fired, it automatically binds a click event to every A that links to the menu:

<a href="#my-menu">Open the menu</a>

Open it manually

Trigger the open custom event to open the menu manually:

$("#my-menu").trigger("open");

Next up: Close the menu »
